metadata.title: CVE-2021-42382 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
A use-after-free in Busybox's awk applet leads to denial of service andpossibly code execution when processing a crafted awk pattern in thegetvar_s function

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-42382` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

busybox - 1:1.30.1-7ubuntu2
busybox-initramfs - 1:1.30.1-7ubuntu2
busybox-static - 1:1.30.1-7ubuntu2
busybox-syslogd - 1:1.30.1-7ubuntu2
udhcpc - 1:1.30.1-7ubuntu2
udhcpd - 1:1.30.1-7ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: busybox package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.30.1-7ubuntu2').
